rules_text: Choose up to X target creatures you control. Each creature chosen this way explores. [i](Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Jaelicia is simply too vast to be explored solely by foot.[/i]
